english: In the name of God, The Most Gracious, The Dispenser of Grace
All praise is due to God alone, the Sustainer of all the worlds
The Most Gracious, the Dispenser of Grace
Lord of the Day of Judgment
Thee alone do we worship; and unto Thee alone do we turn for aid

arabic: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
english: The way of those upon whom Thou hast bestowed Thy blessings, not of those who have been condemned [by Thee], nor of those who go astray

arabic: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
english: THIS DIVINE WRIT - let there be no doubt about it is [meant to be] a guidance for all the God-conscious

arabic: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ
english: Who believe in [the existence of] that which is beyond the reach of human perception, and are constant in prayer, and spend on others out of what We provide for them as sustenance
